questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and flowing water
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

A) The people
B) Flowing water
C) The buildings
D) The sky

A) A tree
B) A person
C) Flowing water
D) A bench

A) Buildings
B) A forest
C) A stone pathway and greenery
D) A mountain

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A car
B) A yellow flower
C) A small bush
D) A playground

What is the relationship between the water and the stone structure?
A) The water is flowing from the stone structure
B) The stone structure is blocking the water
C) The water is surrounding the stone structure
D) The stone structure is behind the water

A) Calm and still
B) Frozen

B) Rough and natural
